TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi MetadataSection extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 XML 元数据或对 XML 元数据的引用。

span.span: Represents XML metadata or references to XML metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类符合 WS-Metadata Exchange 规范中 `wsx:Metadata/wsx:MetadataSection` 元素的定义，并包含 XML 元数据或对 XML 元数据的引用。The class conforms to the definition of the `wsx:Metadata/wsx:MetadataSection` element in the WS-Metadata Exchange specification and contains XML metadata or references to XML metadata. 对象包含 XML 格式的元数据的一种方言（如 Web Services 描述语言（即 WSDL）文件）。A object contains one dialect of metadata in XML form (such as a Web Services Description Language or WSDL file). 您可以将 添加到由 对象表示的 XML 元数据的集合中。You can add a to a collection of XML metadata represented by a object. 大部分 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 元数据系统，如类，而使用类导入或导出的 XML 格式的服务元数据。Much of the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) metadata system, such as the class, use the class to import or export service metadata in XML form. 例如，与导出 WCF 协定或终结点对象和包含 XML 格式的等效元数据的对象上调用适当的导出方法类，传递或对象，并然后调用方法。For example, to export WCF contract or endpoint objects to a object that contains the equivalent metadata in XML form, call the appropriate Export methods on the class, passing either or objects, and then call the method. 若要导入基于 XML 的元数据从对象插入 WCF， ，和对象，将传递的构造函数的对象类并调用其中一个导入方法。To import XML-based metadata from a object into WCF, , and objects, pass a object to the constructor of the class and call one of the import methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 中检索 对象，并循环访问这些对象以将 和 属性写入控制台。The following code example shows how to retrieve the objects from a and iterate through them to write the and properties to the console. [!code-csharp[MetadataResolver#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/metadataresolver/cs/client.cs#3)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string dialect, string identifier, object metadata) cil managed
Public Sub New (dialect As String, identifier As String, metadata As Object)

span.span: The dialect of the metadata.
An identifier for the metadata.
The XML metadata.

summary.span: 使用指定的方言、标识符和 XML 元数据初始化 类的一个新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified dialect, identifier, and XML metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 构造函数可指定要包括在此 中的元数据、方言及其标识符。Use the constructor to specify the metadata to be included in this , its dialect and its identifier. 必须使用 类使元数据对象可序列化，以便序列化 对象。The metadata object must be serializable using the class so that the object can be serialized. 如果元数据对象不可序列化，则序列化对象时会引发异常。If it is not serializable, an exception is thrown when the object is serialized. 如果您要包括元数据引用而不是元数据本身，请使用 参数的 或 `metadata` 对象。Use a or object for the `metadata` parameter if you want to include a reference to the metadata instead of the metadata itself.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Attributes As Collection(Of XmlAttribute)

summary.span: 获取 XML 属性的集合，您可以使用这些属性添加或移除元数据中的属性扩展。

span.span: Gets a collection of XML attributes that you can use to add or remove attributes extensions to the metadata.
The collection of XML attributes for the .
The default collection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可添加或移除属性扩展。Use the property to add or remove attribute extensions. > [!NOTE] > 此集合中未包括方言和标识符属性。The dialect and identifier attributes are not included in this collection.

summary.span: 获取或设置包含的元数据对象。

span.span: Gets or sets the contained metadata object.
The metadata contents for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可访问或修改 中包含的元数据内容。Use the property to access or modify the metadata content contained in the . 元数据对象可以是 ，也可以是作为元数据内容引用的 。The metadata object can be or a as a reference to the metadata content. 当反序列化 时，元数据对象的类型由 XML 内容确定。When a is deserialized, the type of the metadata object is determined from the XML content. 下表描述了可能的返回值。The following table describes the possible return values. |XML 元数据的类型Type of XML metadata|返回类型Returned type| |--------------------------|-------------------| |WSDL 文档WSDL document|| |XML 架构XML Schema|| |元数据引用Metadata reference|| |元数据位置Metadata location|| |策略和所有其他 XML 内容Policy, and all other XML content||
